properties.entry: SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT REPORT_CATE , PRODUCT_NAME , USER_NAME , REPORT_DATE FROM MEMBER M JOIN PRODUCT P ON (M.USER_NO=P.SELLER_NO) JOIN REPORT R USING (PRODUCT_NO) JOIN REPORT_TYPE RT USING (REPORT_TYPE_NO) ORDER BY 4 DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5
INSERT INTO REPORT ( REPORT_NO , PRODUCT_NO , REPORTER , REPORT_TYPE_NO , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPORT.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE )
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM REPORT WHERE REPORTER = ? AND PRODUCT_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM REPORT JOIN REPORT_TYPE USING(REPORT_TYPE_NO) WHERE REPORT_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT REPORT_NO , USER_NAME , PRODUCT_NAME , REPORT_CATE , REPORT_DATE , P.PRODUCT_NO FROM REPORT R JOIN REPORT_TYPE USING(REPORT_TYPE_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.REPORTER = M.USER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT P ON (R.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO) WHERE REPORT_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY 5 DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET CAUTION = CAUTION + 1 WHERE USER_NO = ?

SELECT R.REPORT_NO,PRODUCT_NO,PRODUCT_NAME,M.USER_NAME AS REPORTER, RT.REPORT_CATE,R.REPORT_CONTENT,R.REPORT_DATE FROM REPORT R JOIN PRODUCT P USING (PRODUCT_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.USER_NO = R.REPORTER) JOIN REPORT_TYPE RT USING(REPORT_TYPE_NO) WHERE REPORT_NO = ?
UPDATE REPORT SET REPORT_STATUS = 'N' WHERE REPORT_NO = ? AND REPORT_STATUS = 'Y'
